name: Life - Delaying Death
description:
My Ludum Dare 50, April 2022 contribution

Attention! Game has flash light effect!

In this game jam I focused on the graphics, animation, music and sound effects. The game mechanic was secondary.

Everything during the 3 day jam by Rafael:

  • All graphics and animation (day 1 and 2)
  • Music and sound effects (day 1 and 2)
  • Game idea and all coding (day 3)

Using the following existing:

  • Own generic pooling library
  • Own generic class for start - in-game - info loop
  • Open source Font “Live Savers”
  • Unity

Post-Game-Jam Version (v1.1 PC and Mac, please do not use for rating. WebGL is still the game jam version):

  • Better good:bad ratio
  • Limiting life counter possible value
  • Replaced the "puzzle" symbol with an "anxiety" symbol, as relaxed puzzling is good
